javadoc: Command class for adding external references.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new command for adding external references.

params.name: extLabel
params.comment: label within the external program, may be null if extAddr is not null

params.name: extAddr
params.comment: address within the external program, may be null

params.name: refType
params.comment: reference type (NOTE: data/pointer should generally utilize RefType#DATA

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new command for adding an external reference from data using RefType#DATA.

params.name: extLabel
params.comment: label within the external program, may be null if extAddr is not null

params.name: extAddr
params.comment: address within the external program, may be null

name: SetExternalRefCmd
comment: Command class for adding external references.
